title: The New SuperSix EVO: Why the $3,000 Build is the Only One I’d Buy
content:
The new SuperSix EVO is faster and lighter, but it’s also proof that flagship bikes have an identity crisis. We dig into the "Tarmac-ification" of Cannondale, the new Lance Armstrong biopic, and why hi-viz is victim blaming.

Read the full article at The New SuperSix EVO: Why the $3,000 Build is the Only One I’d Buy on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
